name: GeForce NOW
notes:
Seems to depend on some dlls included in the protonoified  wine version

Working
 - open launcher
 - login to account
 - search games & manage library

Broken
 - game streaming -- crashes with error
content:
files:
- gfn: http://download.nvidia.com/gfnpc/GeForceNOW-release.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Users/user/AppData/Local/NVIDIA Corporation/GeForceNOW/CEF/GeForceNOW.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: /tmp/lutris-geforce
    src: gfn
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/AppData/Local/NVIDIA Corporation/GeForceNOW
    src: /tmp/lutris-geforce/GeforceNOW
- task:
    app: corefonts msxml3 vcrun2019
    arch: win64
    description: Installing needed libraries
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    PROTON_FSHACK_INTEGER_SCALING: '1'
    WINEFSYNC: '1'
    WINE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE: '1'
  restore_gamma: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: ge-protonified-nofshack-4.9-x86_64
